review: She treated very well, and explained excellent she gives a hope to my wife. My wife  was very happy. Before consulting my wife has feared a lot After consulting Dr Anuradha medam, my wife was very happy and scared has gone. I Definitely Referred to her.

I have delivered two of my babies in cloud nine with the help of Dr. Anuradha S.. My first delivery was very complicated.. Me n my baby both were not guaranteed our lives.. I was fighting for my life in ICU for4 days.. N my baby was in NICU for 14days.. I have a bicornuate uterus.. So had a pre delivery.. After dat doctors had told me I won't be able to conceive again.. But God is Great.. After dat God blessed me with two more kids.. My pregnancy waz actually complicated.. But my Dr. Anuradha handled both my pregnancies in sch an easy way wch satisfied me thoroughly.. For my third pregnancy I went through a v bad labor pain during midnight.. After calling her up Dr. turned up immediately to get me out of pain.. N both kids are healthy by d grace f God.. Shez d bst ever doctor I have come across in my life.. I don't think anyone else would have done wat she did for me.. During my second pregnancy I roamed around visiting soo mny doctors.. No one gave me hope wch Dr. Anuradha gave.. After God she z d one whom I relied on, n she was my only hope n trust.. She's awesome..

It's a beautiful phase of my life  and dr.anuradha is been really very helpful,as she's clear  to the patient about everything in detail.. I feel free to ask her anything without any hesitation anytime .. and not only to me ... she's trustworthy to my family as have been consulting from my mother.. elder sisters ... my sister in law... and now I have come all the way from Jodhpur to Bangalore just for my delivery purpose.infact have recommended two of my other friends too who r expecting now . It's really a good experience with her.

Had been as my wife had a bleeding as my wife was carrying 9 weeks of twin pregnancy.. As it was an emergency case had to rush to the hospital  after nessasary scanning as reports were produced as found there was no heart beat in the twin uterus and the cervical pole was not also seen.. As But my wife had lots of questions to ask to the doctor as Dr. anuradha was very harsh in replying and asked" which language shall I make u understand this pregnancy had to be aborted" but being a women doctor she should understand pregnant women pain but had told the matter in much more politeful way..

She is been our doctor since 2014 for our first child. She is a great doctor with vast experience and expertise in her own field. She provides simple solutions to all our queries and suggests/advises care and rest when and how to take. We felt that she prefers normal delivery than caesarian which is great these days. Though I had complete bed rest in my first pregnancy due to fibroids and other complecations, she was successful in me delivering a normal birth. Now we are consulting her for our second child. I recommend her to any person who is seeking consultation or pregnancy related matters.

*** ******** ************** ** ** ********* ****** ******* ** * ***** **** ******** all our fears, concerns were handled by her very empathically. ¬†
She was so helpful that she even told us things that we never knew were important. Like the exercises I could do and avoid, the food I should eat and should not eat. Her behaviour was also very warm and welcoming. ¬†Sometimes it felt as if she was genuinely happy for us even though we only shared a patient and doctor relationship.
All through the pregnancy she never recommended useless medicines. I would love to Thank you Dr. Anuradha Sadashivmurthy , and Thank you Ambika shetty for suggesting a good doctor. Thank you team cloud9 for giving us a better service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been Dr Anuradha mam for my regular pregnancy check from 5th month till my delivery.She was really friendly and did not suggest me any  unecessary medications, and encouraged me throughout my pregnancy journey ..On her advice i deliverd a healthy girl baby on August 23 2023,I really thankful for Anuradha mam and Cloudnine malleshwaram for making my motherhood happy and fruitful..

Doctor explained clearly and she had patience to explain all our doubts and I was convinced with her explanation 
She is a good and efficient doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had a very nice experience with doctor Anuradha. It was our first visit but she gave very nice positive response to us. Her explanation/communication is really great. The
Things I liked from her is she is very friendly with her patients. I would like to recommend the ppl..

Consultation with the doctor was very good however the staff is not good in helping. My appointment for scanning was at 9AM but I was asked to come back at 1PM.  After reaching the hospital my scanning was done only by 3:30PM and the appointment with the doctor was at 12:30PM and there was no special treatment given we were asked to wait for really long and finally I met the doctor at 4:15PM. Staff was really bad in helping us and made is wait for no reason.

I delivered my baby via c section and I must say my experience - check-ups, treatment, operation was flawless! Her professionalism, skill and attitude is amazing. Overall I‚Äôm truly glad to have given birth to my baby under her supervision. Glad to have made the right choice of choosing her as my doctor instead of believing the baseless articles surrounding the internet against her. Thank you Dr.Anuradha for making my journey to motherhood worth cherishing all my life! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

I had a smooth pregnancy and delivery under her guidance. She always has a smile on her face and I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Hi All,
My History- in April 2016, my first child took his last breathe at 36.3 weeks and there were no reasons known why that happened in an extremely normal pregnancy. There were no problems reported ever during the term.

Currently- I am carrying again 27 weeks, and visiting Dr. Anuradha in cloudnine jayanagar, after a good recommendation from our family friends. 
I have found her so far to be very calm, sweet and understanding my concerns properly. I feel connected to her whenever i visit her, and ask so many questions. She respects time and wants us also to be on time of our appointment which i liked a lot. She doesn't seem to be money minded till now and has not offered unnecessary tests for me. I hope i am blessed with a healthy baby soon this time and would appreciate her more and update my feedback sure.

Dr. Anuradha is a very good friendly doctor. I was earlier consulting with Dr. Madhulika at Cloud9 Old Airport Rd and she referred me to Dr. Anuradha at Malleshwaram Cloud9. I used to travel from Whitefield to Malleshwaram to consult with her. I remember this day when I could not make it on time for my appointment and the Dr was about to leave for the day and already had her driver waiting for her. On seeing me wait at the reception she was ready to take up my check up. She makes you feel comfortable to discuss anhhy questions that you have especially if it is ur first preg. She was also  featured in the Deccan newspaper and I was very proud that she is my Doctor and I told all my friends about the same.

To all the moms-to-be, I would recommend Dr. Anuradha Sadashivamurthy for this beautiful journey of life. No second thoughts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had to change my doctor in 34th week of my pregnancy as the hospital closed down. Thats when I visited Cloudnine and she was the available Gyno. Since it was only few visits before delivery, she seemed to be fine.

Post delivery, I visited her and she was very very rude to me as well as my mother. I went to her for irregular periods, and she suggested low dosage pills ******* **** ********* ** *** ***** ********** When I asked her why should I consume pills without even knowing the issue- she asked me to take it, because she is telling me to. I do understand doctor knows better than a patient, that doesnt mean she can be harsh.

Doctor is caring and very helpful.
Giving good guidance each and every step about food  and  she also given courage in each and every step
